Stowmarket Library

Manager: Ursula Scott

Milton Road, Stowmarket
IP14 1EX

Tel: 01449 700549
Fax: 01449 672629
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Friends of Stowmarket Library

Social media:

  • Facebook
  • Twitter

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Out-of-hours book return available
  • Customer toilet
  • Which? available - ask staff for magazine or to log in

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Photocopying: available
  • Colour printing: available
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges

Health & wellbeing events

Cake, Cancer and Coffee support group

third Thursday of the month, 1430-1630

Information and peer support for carers, family and friends of those with cancer. Visit the Cake, Cancer and Coffee website for more information. Run in association with Stowmarket Lions.

Councillor surgeries & professional advice

NatWest information drop-in

every other Tuesday, 0930-1230

A community assistance opportunity to support existing NatWest customers with their banking needs.

Fundraising, stalls & book sales

Book sale

first Saturday of the month, 1000-1200
